value.title: Trim/ remove spaces in a text column Power Query - Power BI Tips & Tricks #29
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to trim or remove spaces (whitespaces) in Power Query / Power BI  Link to Ken Puls blog if you want to copy the function: http://www.excelguru.ca/blog/2015/10/08/clean-whitespace-in-powerquery/   Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Display selected value from slicer to Power BI Report
value.excerpt: Sometimes, there is a situation where we need to display the selected slicer value in the title of our Power BI visualization. Meaning, we need to set the Dynamic value for our Title column based on the slicer selection. How can we achieve this? How can we set dynamic title value for our Power BI visualization?

value.title: How to Sync Two Slicers on the Same Page in Power BI?
value.excerpt: During this session, we will talk about Advanced Properties for the Sync Slicer in Power BI. Sometimes we have a scenario where want functionality that if we select some value from the slicer the same value should be selected from another slicer on the same page. At that time how we can achieve this

value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway
value.excerpt: This video was based on a call I had last week relating to troubleshooting connectivity to a SQL Server named instance from the Power BI gateway. This is really my thought process for how I handle connection errors to a data source from any application.    LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Create Power BI reports in Power BI Report Server
value.excerpt: Create Power BI reports in Power BI Report Server  In this video, I walk through the steps to create your Power BI Report in order to publish it to Power BI Report Server. This involves downloading and installing Power BI Desktop optimized for Power BI Report Server and connecting to Analysis Services

value.title: Easily get an access token for the Power BI Embedded Playground
value.excerpt: You need an Embed Token for the Power BI Embedded Playground, but you don't want to write code. Adam shows you how to easily get an access token with no code using PowerShell.  Power BI Embedded Playground - https://microsoft.github.io/PowerBI-JavaScript/demo/ Power BI REST API - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/power-bi/

value.title: Parameters and Templates with Power BI Desktop
